summary: Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.
cast: Melisa Young|Jordan Gelber|Selma Blair|Mia Farrow|Christopher Walken|Zachary Booth|Donna Murphy|Tyler Maynard|Mary Joy|Peter McRobbie|Justin Bartha|Aasif Mandvi|Di Quon|Lee Wilkof|Tara-Lee Pollin|Keith Kuhl|Kathryn Avery|Laurena Baros|Courtney Cooper|Daniel Genalo|Nicole Guidetti|Brian Henninger|Graham Kurtz|Leah O'Donnell|Cody Rigsby|Steven Rosa|Kenneth Maharaj|Stephanie Mas|Kimberly McVicar|Abe Mendel|Michela Pantano|Edward Sass III|Mark Steiger
keywords: hepatitis b|man wrapped in a towel|collectible|theater poster|poster
title: Dark Horse
